data.title: Travis Barker’s Ex-Wife Reacts To Kourtney Kardashian’s ‘Surprise’ Pregnancy Reveal With The Blink-182 Drummer: ‘I’ve Known For Weeks’
data.meta_description: Travis Barker's ex-wife is sharing her reaction after Kourtney Kardashian, 44, revealed her pregnancy with the 47-year-old Blink-182 drummer.
data.text:
Travis Barker’s ex-wife, Shanna Moakler, is sharing her reaction after his current wife, Kourtney Kardashian, revealed that they are expecting their first child together! As The Shade Room previously reported, Kardashian and Barker tied the knot in Portofino, Italy, in May 2022. However, the celebration was just one of the couple’s three wedding ceremonies that year.

RELATED: (Photos) Kourtney Kardashian & Travis Barker Tie The Knot In Italy!

Kourtney Kardashian’s Pregnancy Reveal

The 44-year-old mother of three attended her husband’s Blink-182 concert on Friday, June 16, in Los Angeles, California. During the band’s performance, Kardashian lifted a sign that read, “TRAVIS I’M PREGNANT.”

The video of Kardashian holding the sign was projected to the entire crowd. Additionally, Barker appeared shocked as he took in the news, placing his hands on his forehead.

Shortly after, Barker exited the stage and embraced his wife with a loving hug and kiss.

Furthermore, according to PEOPLE, Kardashian’s pregnancy reveal paid homage to Blink-182’s 1999 music video “All The Small Things,” where a fan is also seen holding a sign of the same words.

Kourtney Kardashian Shows Off Baby Bump As She & Travis Embrace

Shortly after, Kardashian returned to Instagram with a brief message regarding the new chapter in her and her husband’s lives.

“Overwhelmed with gratitude and joy for God’s blessing and plan.”

Travis Barker’s Ex-Wife Reacts, Along With Social Media Users

Shortly after the reveal, Instagram users took to Shanna Moakler’s official account to elicit a response from Barker’s ex-wife regarding his recent pregnancy reveal. Moakler and Barker were reportedly married in 2004 and separated in 2008, as per PEOPLE. Furthermore, they share two children, as well as a stepdaughter.

According to TMZ, Moakler revealed in her Instagram comments that she is “very excited for the couple.”

“Very excited for them, hope they have a great experience bringing in a new life to the world.”

However, the outlet reports that Moakler also explained that the “surprise” reveal was “not news” to her.

“I’ve known for weeks this is not new news to me”

Additionally, social media users also questioned how Barker was not privy to his wife’s growing baby bump. In the comment section of Kardashian’s baby bump photos, users shared their questions.

“He honestly didn’t know with her stomach looking about 5 months pregnant?”

While Instagram user, @naturallynami, added.
